system.description: When outnumbered, you thrive on the chaos, gaining the same advantages your enemies would normally have against you.
system.benefit: When the Ork is outnumbered in Melee Combat, they gain the same bonuses to hit as their enemies would from outnumbering the Ork. This effect stacks with Combat Master Talent, denying the outnumbering benefit to the enemies but still giving it to you.

combat.condition: When outnumbered in melee combat, gain the same bonuses enemies would have

specialAbilities.name: Reverse Outnumbering
specialAbilities.description: When outnumbered in melee, gain the same bonuses enemies would get. Stacks with Combat Master.
